name: Dark Advisor
text: [special] - Draw 3 cards. Then place a card from your hand on the top or bottom of your deck.

flavor: "Prima ero Darth, ora solo Maul."
name: Maul
subtitle: In Cerca di Vendetta
text: Dopo che 1 o più dadi personaggio o miglioria di questo personaggio sono stati rimossi dall'effetto di una carta di un avversario, puoi rimuovere 1 dado di quell'avversario.

flavor: "I use dark magick to achieve power."
name: Mother Talzin
subtitle: Nightsister Matriarch
text: After you activate this character, you may reveal the top card of a player's deck. If its cost is an odd number, turn one of that player's dice to any side.

flavor: "There is no mercy."
name: Palpatine
subtitle: Darth Sidious
text: Azione Straordinaria - Play an event from your hand, decreasing its cost by the number of different damage symbols ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) showing on your dice.

name: Kylo Ren's Starfighter
text: [special] - Choose a color. Then reveal an opponent's hand and deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to them equal to the number of cards in their hand that match the chosen color.

name: Crystal Ball
text: After you activate attached character, you may look at the top card of a deck.

name: Force Rend
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Spend resources equal to the cost of a support or upgrade in play to discard it.

name: Spada Laser di Maul
text: Solo personaggi blu. Azione Straordinaria - Se ogni personaggio di un avversario è privo di scudi, tira questo dado nella tua riserva.

flavor: "Roger, Roger."
name: Battle Droid
text: After you activate this character, if this die just rolled indirect damage ([indirect]), you may activate one of your other Battle Droids ([LEG]9).

flavor: "Face me!"
name: Kallus
subtitle: Agent of the Empire
text: Azione Straordinaria - Turn this die showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to a side showing melee damage ([melee]), or vice versa.

flavor: "Ah, victory!"
name: Nute Gunray
subtitle: Separatist Viceroy
text: Each opponent gains 1 fewer resource during the upkeep phase, to a minimum of 1, unless that opponent discards the top 2 cards of their deck.

flavor: "Fear will keep the local systems in line."
name: Tarkin
subtitle: Grand Moff
text: Azione Straordinaria - Remove 2 of your dice showing the same symbol to deal 4 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

flavor: I soldati scelti dell'Esercito Imperiale venivano addestrati a obbedire ciecamente alla gerarchia di comando all'Imperatore Galattico Palpatine.
name: Assaltatore Veterano

flavor: A heavy transport starship used by the Trade Federation for transporting and deploying droid battalions planet side.
name: Separatist Landing Craft
text: [special] - Spend 2 resources to add a Battle Droid ([LEG]9) to your team. Discard this support from play.

flavor: Commonly used by the Galactic Empire's death troopers and coastal defender stormtroopers.
name: Fragmentation Grenade
text: After this die is resolved, discard this upgrade from play unless you spend 1 resource.

name: Grand Moff
text: Unique Red characer only. Azione Straordinaria - Use the "Claim" ability on the battlefield or switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game).

name: Kallus' Bo-Rifle
text: Imboscata.

flavor: "Nudd Chaa."
name: Bib Fortuna
subtitle: Majordomo
text: [special] - Roll a character die on one of your other characters into your pool.

flavor: "non metterti sulla mia strada."
name: Boba Fett
subtitle: Mercenario Letale
text: [special] - Infliggi un ammontare di danni pari al valore di 1 dado (tuo o di un avversario) a un personaggio.

name: Doctor Aphra
subtitle: Artifact Hunter
text: The cost of the first droid you play each round is decreased by 1. After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself, you may draw a card.

flavor: "Going somewhere, Solo?"
name: Greedo
subtitle: Unlucky Mercenary
text: Before this character is defeated, roll any number of his character dice into your pool. Then resolve any number of his character dice in the order of your choice.

name: Rebel Traitor
text: After you activate this character, you may force an opponent to activate one of their character as their next action this round, if able.

flavor: "Welcome aboard the Ark Angel, sir Darth Vader. Big Fan. Huge!" <cite>Dr. Aphra</cite>
name: Ark Angel
text: After you activate this support, activate up to 2 of your other supports in the order of your choice.

name: BT-1
text: After you activate this support, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself. Then deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

name: Slave I
text: Azione Straordinaria - Reroll one of your Yellow dice. Then you may remove an opponent's die showing a value equal to the value showing on the die you just rerolled.

name: Hunter Instinct
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character, or 2 damage instead if that character has 3 or more damage on it.

name: Wrist Rockets
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. You may spend 1 resource to deal 2 damage to a character.

name: BB-9E
text: [special] - Reroll an opponent's die. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.

flavor: "Sometimes it takes courage to stick to one's beliefs."
name: Aayla Secura
subtitle: Jedi General
text: [special] - Turn one of your Blue or Red dice to any side. Turn an opponent's die to any side.

name: Jedi Temple Guard
text: Guardian.

flavor: "Voglio conoscere le vie della Forza e diventare un Jedi, come mio padre."
name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Eroe Improbabile
text: Azione Straordinaria - Spendi 2 risorse per risolvere 1 dado personaggio o miglioria di questo personaggio, aumentando di 2 il suo valore.

flavor: "Your move"
name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Jedi Master
text: After you activate this character, you may give a character 1 shield.

flavor: "Do. Or do not. There is not try."
name: Yoda
subtitle: Wizened Master
text: [special]- Choose and do two of the following: gain 1 resource, give a characeter 1 shield, turn one of your dice to any side, or dicard the top card of a deck.

flavor: The ETA-2 Interceptor was the starfighter of choice of Jedi during the Clone Wars.
name: ETA-2 Interceptor
text: Azione - Remove this die or one of your dice showing a shield ([shield]) to exhaust a support.

flavor: "I've never seen a jam he couldn't beep his way out of." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
name: R2-D2
text: [special] - Draw a card. You may turn one of your dice to any side.

name: Force Meditation
text:
To play, spot a Blue character.
[special] - Discard the top 2 cards of a deck.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give attached character 1 shield. Deal unblockable damage to a character equal to the number of shields on attached character.

flavor: "Someone's out to start a war." <cite>Mace Windu</cite>
name: Clone Trooper
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll this die, or, if you control the battlefield, you may reroll one of your character dice.

name: Finn
subtitle: Soldier of Necessity
text: [special] - Move 1 damage from a card to another card in play (this ignores shields).

flavor: "I work behind pipes all day."
name: Rose
subtitle: Skilled Mechanic
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource. You may remove 1 damage from a support.

flavor: "Making my run now."
name: Wedge Antilles
subtitle: Squad Leader
text: Azione Straordinaria - Turn one of your vehicle dice to any side.

name: Mortar Team
text: While you control the battlefield, you may resolve the indirect damage ([indirect]) sides of this die as if they were ranged damage ([ranged]).

name: Resistance Bomber
text:
After this die is resolved, place 1 damage on this support.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.

name: Camouflaged Rifle
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if you control the battlefield.

name: Rebellion Leader
text: Unique Red character only. Azione Straordinaria - Remove an opponent's die showing the same symbol as one of your dice.

flavor: "Le strane religioni e le loro antiche armi contano poco contro un blaster al fianco."
name: Han Solo
subtitle: Contrabbandiere Scaltro
text: Dopo che hai attivato questo personaggio, puoi ripetere il tiro di 1 dado (tuo o di un avversario).

flavor: "Dissen ganna be messy!"
name: Jar Jar Binks
subtitle: Clumsy Outcast
text:
Any player may take an action to force you to activate this character.
After you activate this character, reroll all dice showing a symbol not showing on his character dice.

name: Jedha Partisan
text: After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent for the first time each round, you may discard the top card of a deck.

flavor: "Save the Rebellion! Save the dream."
name: Saw Gerrera
subtitle: Extremist Leader
text: [special] - Discard a random card from a player's hand. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to its cost.

flavor: "There's just something about the feeling of their helmets on my fists."
name: Zeb Orrelios
subtitle: The Last Lasat
text: You may resolve the melee damage ([melee]) sides of this die as if they were ranged damage ([ranged]).

name: Runaway Boomas
text: Azione Straordinaria - Spend 1 resource to roll a Runaway Boomas ([LEG]51) die into your pool. Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.

flavor: "Chewie… we're home." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
name: Millennium Falcon
text: After to activate this support, you may activate one of your characters.

name: Roguish Charm
text: Yellow character only. [special] - Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Gain resources equal to the resource cost showing on it (not its value).

flavor: "Only the Honor Guard of Lasan may carry a bo-rifle!" <cite>Zeb Orrelios</cite>
name: Zeb Orrelios' Bo-Rifle
text: Azione - Spend 1 resource to resolve this die showing a modifier (a side with a +) as if it did not have a modifier.

flavor: These ships were painted red when used to transport diplomats as a warning not to attack.
name: Republic Cruiser
text: [special] - Give a unique character 2 shields or give each of your unique characters 1 shield.

name: Force Focus
text:
To play, spot a Blue character.
[special] - Turn one of your dice to any side. You may reveal a Blue card from your hand to turn an opponent's die to any side.

name: Force Wave
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character. Deal 2 damage to a another character. Deal 1 damage to a third character.

name: Heirloom Lightsaber
text: This upgrade has the Redeploy keyword while it's on a Blue character.

name: Hush-98 Comlink
text: Azione - Remove this die to activate any number of your characters and/or supports in the order of your choice.

name: Ground Battalion
text: After you activate this support, you may take control of the battlefield. (This does not claim the battlefield.)

name: Lookout Post
text: Play only if you control the battlefield.

flavor: Sometimes the best tactic is to not aim.
name: Auto Cannon

flavor: Standard issue for Imperial stormtroopers, the E-11 blaster was often found in rebel hands.
name: E-11 Blaster
text: Redeploy.

name: 74-Z Speeder Bike
text: Azione - Resolve this die and one of attached character's character dice in the order of your choice.

flavor: "Well that's just good business."
name: Hondo Ohnaka
subtitle: Respected Businessman
text: [special] - Deal 3 damage to an opponent's character unless that opponent gives you 1 resource.

flavor: "But you know what I always say: speak softly, and drive a big tank." <cite>Hondo Ohnaka</cite>
name: Pirate Speeder Tank
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, give a character 2 shields, and take one additional action.

name: Bartering
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource. You may force each player to draw a card.

name: Gang Up
text: X is equal to the number of Yellow characters you have in play.

name: Vibrocutlass
text:
Redeploy.
Decrease the resource cost on this die by 1 while this upgrade is on a Yellow character.

name: Modified HWK-290
text:
After you play this support, place 2 damage on it.
After you activate this support, deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the damage on it.

name: Canto Bight Pistol
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if it is a villain.

name: Hidden Blaster
text:
Imboscata.
After you play this upgrade, you may remove 1 shield from a character.

flavor: Slugthrowers, like the 6-2Aug2, were commonly found on backwater planets like Tatooine.
name: Hunting Rifle
Stun Baton
text: After a character takes damage from this die, you may spend 1 resource to remove one that character's character dice.

name: Consumed By The Dark Side
text: Deal 1 damage to one of your blue characters to turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Dark Scheme
text: Look at the top 5 cards of an opponent's deck. Discard one of them and place the rest on the top of their deck in the order of your choice.

name: Double Strike
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) without removing it from your pool.

name: Frighten
text:
Imboscata.
Remove a total of up to 3 shields from any number of characters.

name: I Am Your Father
text: Resolve an opponent's character die as if it were your own unless that opponent discards all cards from their hand.

name: Snare
text:
Play only if you have one or more exhausted characters.
Exhaust a character.

name: Spell of Removal
text: Spot a Blue character to discard the top card of a deck. If its cost is an odd number, remove a die.

name: Witch Magick
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck (do not rearrange them). Heal damage from a character equal to the number of cards you just revealed that cost an odd number.

name: Nightsister Coven
text: After a character die rolls a blank ([blank]), you may exhaust this support to reveal the top card of a deck. If its cost is an odd number, deal 1 damage to that character.

name: Affaticamento
text:
Gioca questa carta solo se ogni personaggio di un avversario possiede 1 o più danni.
Rimuovi 1 dado di quell'avversario.

name: Crush the Rebellion
text: Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to half of the value showing on that die, rounded up.

name: Potenza Imperiale
text: Risolvi 1 tuo dado, aumentando di 2 il suo valore.

name: Scorched Earth
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice in their pool.

name: Shrapnel Blast
text: Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. Then you may remove a character die belonging to the character that was just dealt indirect damage ([indirect]).

name: Target Practice
text: Reroll any number of your Red dice. Then reroll any number of your Red dice.

name: Three Steps Ahead
text: Take up to 3 additional actions.

name: Command Bridge
text: Azione - Exhaust this support to activate 2 of your non-unique characters in the order of your choice.

flavor: "That was fun. Let's never do that again." <cite>Doctor Aphra</cite>
name: Delve
text: Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself to play a support or upgrade from your hand for free.

name: Free-For-All
text: Remove any number of your dice. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice you just removed.

name: In Pursuit
text:
Play only if an opponent activated one or more characters during their last turn this round.
Activate any number of your Yellow characters in the order of your choice.

name: No Good To Me Dead
text: Heal up to 2 damage from an opponent's character. Gain resources equal to the amount of damage you just healed.

name: Dicerie
text: Obbliga un avversario a scegliere 1 carta nella sua mano. Poi guarda tutte le altre carte nella sua mano e scartane 1.

name: Soggiogare
text: Scegli 1 personaggio che possiede 3 o più danni. Rimuovi 1 suo dado personaggio o miglioria.

name: Spiccare il Volo
text:
Imboscata.
Ripeti il tiro di un massimo di 2 tuoi dadi gialli.

name: Outnumber
text:
Play only if an opponent has fewer characters in play than you.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.

name: Adapt
text: Remove 1 shield from one of your characters to gain 1 resource.

name: Ataru Strike
text: Resolve one of your Blue character dice showing melee damage ([melee]), increaing its value by the number of shields on that character.

name: Heightened Awareness
text:
Imboscata.
Give a character 3 shields.

name: Investigate
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add one of them to your hand and place the rest on the top of your deck in the order of your choice.

name: Strength Through Weakness
text: Discard the top 4 cards of a deck.

name: Unbreakable
text: Remove a die showing a value equal to or less than the number of shields on your characters.

name: Defensive Teaching
text: Each of your Blue characters can have 1 additional shield.

name: Yoda's Hut
text: Azione - Exhaust this support to give a character 1 shield. Gain 1 resource if that character has 3 or more shields.

name: Attack Run
text:
Imboscata.
Active one of your supports.

name: Equip
text: Move a weapon from one of your characters to another character (return its die to its card).

name: Final Moment
text: Ready each of your characters. After the action phase ends, you lose the game.

name: Light 'Em Up
text: Reroll one of your dice. If it just rolled ranged damage ([ranged]), you may resolve that die and another one of your dice showing ranged damaged, increasing one of their values by 2.

name: Mend
text: Heal 3 damage from a character or remove 3 damage from a support.

name: Refit
text: Play a vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1. Then place 1 damage on it.

name: Special Modification
text: Remove 3 damage from a support or turn a support die to any side.

name: Suppression Field
text: Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it. Azione - Exhaust this support to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Place damage on this support equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Spavalderia
text: Avvista 1 personaggio giallo per rimuovere 1 dado di un avversario. poi infliggi 2 danni a un personaggio.

name: Easy Pickings
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove 2 dice showing the same symbol and value (ignoring modifiers and resource costs).

name: Explosive Tactics
text: Discard the top card of a deck. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to its cost.

name: Impulsivo
text:
Imboscata.
Risolvi 1 tuo dado.

name: Scruffy Looking Nerf-Herder
text: Choose one of the following card types: event, support, or upgrade. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard a card of the chosen type from it.

name: Rotta del Contrabbandiere
text: Attiva 1 tuo personaggio giallo. Se 1 o più suoi dadi personaggio o miglioria hanno appena ottenuto "risorsa" ([resource]), ottieni 1 risorsa.

flavor: Maz Kanata aveva accumulato una grande collezione di oggetti curiosi nel corso dei suoi molti viaggi in tutta la galassia.
name: Sotterraneo di Maz
text: Durante la fase di gestione, ogni giocatore ottiene 1 risorsa aggiuntiva.

name: Diplomatic Protection
text: Before attached character is defeated, you may discard this upgrade to give each of your other characters 2 shields.

name: Into The Garbage Chute
text: Exhaust one of your characters to remove up to 2 dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).

name: Alterazione
text: Gira fino a 2 dadi (tuoi e/o dei tuoi avversari) su una faccia a tua scelta.

name: Ancient Wisdom
text: Draw 2 cards.

name: Feel The Force
text: Turn a Blue die to any side.

name: Invigorate
text: Spot a Blue character to heal 1 damage from each of your characters.

name: Legacies
text: Spot a Blue character to resolve one of your dice showing a modifier (a side with a +) as if it did not have a modifier.

name: Fuorviare
text: Rimuovi 1 dado personaggio di valore pari o inferiore a 2.

name: Respite
text: Exhaust one of your characters to gain 1 resource and draw a card.

name: Stronger You Have Become
text: Count the number of upgrades you have in play. Reroll up to that many dice (yours and/or your opponents').

name: La Forza É Con Me
text: Rimuovi 1 dado "danno a distanza" ([ranged]) o "danno secondario" ([indirect]).

name: Perseveranza
text: Azione - Esaurisci questo supporto per ripetere il tiro di 1 tuo dado. poi puoi ripetere di nuovo il tiro di quel dado.

name: Resilient
text: After an opponent's card effect removes one of attached character's character dice, you may exhaust this upgrade to roll that die into your pool.

name: Giro di Vite
text:
Gioca questa carta solo se ogni personaggio di un avversario possiede 1 o più danni.
Ottieni 1 risorsa.

name: Crash Landing
text: Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Law and Order
text: Spot a Red character to discard an upgrade from play.

name: Carico e Pronto al Fuoco
text: Avvista 1 personaggio rosso per girare fino a 2 tuoi dadi su una faccia "danno secondario" ([indirect]).

name: Reinforce
text: Roll a character die on one of your characters into your pool if you have another copy of that character in play.

name: Strength in Numbers
text: Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of exhausted characters you have.

name: Sudden Impact
text: Remove one of your dice showing damage ([ranged],[melee], or [indirect]). Then deal damage to each of an opponent's characters equal to half of the value showing on that die, rounded up.

name: Posizione di Superiorità
text:
Gioca questa carta solo se controlli il campo di battaglia.
Rimuovi 1 dado.

name: Informazioni sul Bersaglio
text: Risolvi 1 tuo dado "danno secondario" ([indirect]) come se fosse "danno a distanza" ([ranged]).

name: Bubble Shield
text:
You may distribute indirect damage ([indirect]) to this support as if it were a character with 3 health.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.

name: Cover Team
text: Azione – Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing indirect damage ([indirect]), increasing its value by 1.

name: Sbeffeggiare
text: Ripeti il tiro di 1 dado di un avversario. Se ha appena ottenuto "vuoto" ([blank]), prendi 1 risorsa da quell'avversario.

name: Cantina Brawl
text: Deal 1 damage to an opponent's character. Then that opponent may discard a card from their hand to repeat this effect.

name: Counter Strike
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged],[melee], or [indirect]), increasing its value by 2 if an opponent resolved one or more dice showing that same damage symbol during their last turn this round.

name: Manovra pericolosa
text: Cura 2 danni a un tuo personaggio. Infliggi 2 danni secondari ([indirect]) a te stesso.

name: Entangle
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove up to 2 dice showing a combined value of 3 or less.

name: Faccia a Faccia
text: Ripeti il tiro di 1 tuo dado personaggio e di 1 dado personaggio di un avversario (a tua scelta). Poi infliggi 2 danni a ogni personaggio il cui dado ha appena ottenuto il valore più basso (in caso di parità, a entrambi i personaggi).

name: Uscita Precipitosa
text: Cedi il controllo del campo di battaglia a un avversario per rimuovere 1 dado "danno" ([ranged],[melee], or [indirect]).

name: Lure
text:
Imboscata.
Choose an opponent's character or support and force them to activate it, if able.

name: Estrazione Rapida
text: Gioca 1 Arma dalla tua mano su un tuo personaggio (pagandone il costo). Puoi attivare quel personaggio.

name: Vandalize
text: Remove a number of your character dice equal to the cost of a support or upgrade in play to discard it.

name: Well-Connected
text: Spot a Yellow character to gain 1 resource. Each opponent may draw a card.

name: Difesa
text:
Imboscata.
Rimuovi fino a 3 dadi "danno in mischia" ([melee]).

name: Dive
text:
Imboscata.
Remove up to 3 dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).

name: Tempesta di Ghiaccio
text: Rimuovi 1 scudo da ogni personaggio.

name: No Cheating
text: Deal damage to an opponent's character equal to the number of additional actions that opponent took during their last turn this round.

name: Shelter
text: Remove a die showing indirect damage ([indirect]).

name: Specialista di Riserva
text: Azione - Esaurisci questo supporto per ripetere il tiro di un massimo di 2 tuoi dadi.

name: Remote Stockpile
text: Azione - Exaust this support to place 1 resource on it or take all resources from it.

name: Scrap Heap
text: After you discard one or more cards from an opponent's deck, you may exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.

name: Bodyguard
text:
Non-unique character only.
Attached character has the Guardian keyword.

name: Fondina per Estrazione Rapida
text: Dopo che hai attivato il personaggio con questa miglioria, puoi ripetere il tiro di un qualsiasi numero di suoi dadi Arma.

name: Espionage
text: After setup, discard the top card from each deck.

name: Fortify
text: After setup, give a character 1 shield.

name: Preemptive Strike
text: After setup, deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

name: Profitable Connection
text: You start the game with 1 additional resource.

name: Stolen Intel
text: After setup, draw a card.

name: Taking Ground
text: Add 2 to the value of your roll for the battlefield during setup.

name: Desolazioni Aride
subtitle: Geonosis
text: Rivendicazione - Obbliga un avversario a perdere 1 risorsa.

name: Citadel Landing Zone
subtitle: Scarif
text: Rivendicazione - Reroll any number of your dice. Then you may resolve one of your dice.

name: Imperial Palace
subtitle: Coruscant
text: Rivendicazione - Look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

name: Launch Deck
subtitle: Home One
text: Rivendicazione - Remove one of your dice to deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to half of the value showing on it, rounded up.

name: Avamposto della Fascia Esterna
subtitle: Nal Hutta
text: Rivendicazione - Ottieni 1 risorsa e pesca 1 carta.

name: Petranaki Arena
subtitle: Geonosis
text: Rivendicazione - Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself to deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.

name: Power Generator Trench
subtitle: Death Star I
text: Rivendicazione - Turn a die to any side.
